content: * *Bukit Merah Single Member Constituency** was a [constituency](/wiki/Constituencies_of_Singapore) in Singapore. It existed from 1959 to 1997, when it was merged with Leng Kee division of the [Tanjong Pagar GRC](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_GRC). ## Member of Parliament ElectionMember of ParliamentParty**1959**Sellappa Ramaswamy[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1963**Lim Huan Boon[BS](/wiki/Barisan_Sosialis)**1966**[Lim Guan Hoo](/wiki/Lim_Guan_Hoo)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1968****1972****1976****1977**Lim Chee Onn**1980****1984****1988****1991**[Ch'ng Jit Koon](/wiki/Ch%27ng_Jit_Koon) ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1950s [General Election
